comments:
Created an attachment (id=82762)
the patch

The following bug can be tested by creating an ATL file which only contains :
module Test;
create OUT : TEST refining IN : TEST 

Then, when clicking on the "refining" or other keyword, the following error occurs :
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.m2m.atl.adt.ui.outline.AtlContentOutlinePage.showItem(AtlContentOutlinePage.java:503)

The attached patch solves the problem.

This bug has been fixed on CVS :
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/org.eclipse.m2m/org.eclipse.m2m.atl/plugins/org.eclipse.m2m.atl.adt.editor/src/org/eclipse/m2m/atl/adt/ui/outline/AtlContentOutlinePage.java?root=Modeling_Project&view=log
